name: Niloy Alamgir
content:
Niloy Alamgir  is a Bangladeshi model and actor.[1][2][3][4] He is the champion in Fair & Lovely Super Hero Super Heroine contest in 2009 - organized by BFDC, Market Access Group & NTV.[5]
 Niloy Alamgir started his journey in film and TV media after winning Super Hero Super Heroine contest in 2009.[3] He made his film debut in 2011 with Baily Road directed by Masood Kayenat. His latest movie Olpo Olpo Premer Golpo was released 29 August 2014.[6][7][8]
 He has done TV commercials:[9] Keya white plus detergent powder, Banglalink desh5, Ice cool soap, Singer etc.

Niloy Alamgirনিলয় আলমগীরBornMd Alamgir Hossain NiloyNationalityBangladeshiOccupationActor, modelYears active2010 – presentSpouse(s)Anika Kabir Shokh
​ ​(m. 2016; div. 2017)​ParentsAwlad Hossain (father)Asma Hossain (mother)
Niloy Alamgir  is a Bangladeshi model and actor.[1][2][3][4] He is the champion in Fair & Lovely Super Hero Super Heroine contest in 2009 - organized by BFDC, Market Access Group & NTV.[5]

Contents

1 Career
2 Filmography
3 Television

3.1 TV films

3.3 Web series
3.4 ShortFilms


4 References
5 External links


Career[edit]
Niloy Alamgir started his journey in film and TV media after winning Super Hero Super Heroine contest in 2009.[3] He made his film debut in 2011 with Baily Road directed by Masood Kayenat. His latest movie Olpo Olpo Premer Golpo was released 29 August 2014.[6][7][8]
He has done TV commercials:[9] Keya white plus detergent powder, Banglalink desh5, Ice cool soap, Singer etc.
